title: Wayne Rooney parties surrounded by bar girls amid Coleen and Rebekah Vardy WAG war
text:
Get the biggest football stories by email Subscribe Thank you for subscribing We have more newsletters Show me See our privacy notice Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email

Wayne Rooney showed no signs of pressure around his wife Coleen’s Wag battle with Rebekah Vardy - as he went out drinking and was surrounded by bar girls.

The striker, now playing for DC United in Washington, was pictured hanging out at The Living Room club venue in the City.

He posed with fans in the bar and was offered drinks from some of the female bar staff, who were dressed in tiny black uniforms.

The 33-year-old has continued to use twitter but has made no a single comment about his wife’s fall out.

And his night on the town came just hours after his wife Coleen has spent the night partying with pals in Manchester.

(Image: Samim Eslami/Instagram)

(Image: Samim Eslami/Instagram)

(Image: Samim Eslami/Instagram)

She was out until 4am and knocked back champagne with fellow Wags at a 40th party in Manchester for ex-Old Trafford ace Wes Brown.

A fellow clubber said Coleen was “the life and soul of the party and really let her hair down”.

By contrast, Rebekah Vardy has been showing the strain of the twitter row, where Coleen accused Rebekah of leaking stories about the Rooneys.

(Image: Samim Eslami/Instagram)

(Image: Samim Eslami/Instagram)

(Image: Samim Eslami/Instagram)

After flying back from Dubai she was shown in tears as she left Heathrow airport at the weekend.

Coleen caused an internet storm when she said someone using Rebekah’s account had sold stories on her.

(Image: Samim Eslami/Instagram)

(Image: Instagram)

(Image: Instagram)

The stories contained fake things that had happened to Coleen, including choosing her next baby’s gender, a flooding in her house and a return to TV, which all got leaked to the press after she put them on her Instagram stories page and only gave Rebekah access to view them.

Rebekah denies leaking the stories and has launched an investigation into what has happened.

She said last week: “I’m not saying anything more until we’ve finished looking into this situation properly.”
description: Footie star socialises with scantily-clad bar staff in Washington DC following his silence over Coleen and Becky's Instagram battle
